page.title: 08TRANSPORT - THREE MOSSES
page.content: Because of the nature of the area, travel is in the main by private car. The bus service travels in both directions i.e. to Southport or to Liverpool. This service is operated by the Ribble Bus Company, and runs on an hourly schedule. The bus service does not travel through the whole area only through the main street of Haskayne village, although at one time the Cheshire Lines Railway dissected the two lower portions to left and right of the designated area. The lines were closed during the Beeching cuts, the rails and sleepers were removed, but the slight embankments and cuttings are still in evidence, part of these disused railway track is now a Nature Reserve.
